column2: there's more. As I had to unbutton my pants and had no shame gluttonizing my way through the pizza and wings
column3: I had to finish it off with their dessert. And yet again
column4: it was bomb. It's a pizookie Â basically
column5: a chocolate chip cookie with a bunch of vanilla ice cream and whipped cream. Idk what's different in this one vs bjs but it was amazingly good. Cookie was good

column7: I can go back just for that or any of the three things I had separately.
